title: Receipt
description: A Receipt is a proof of a successful transaction with a service. May be used in the App for further interaction with the service.

action.description: The Action document that formed the Receipt.

uri.description: The URI for doing updates on the Receipt.

jwt.description: A JWT to be used when doing updates on the Receipt.

items.description: An Interval, start and end time for i.e. an event or booking.

intervals.description: An array of Intervals, used for events or bookings.
